verses.text_plain: The burden of Moab. Because in the night Ar of Moab is laid waste, and brought to silence; because in the night Kir of Moab is laid waste, and brought to silence;
verses.verse_html:
1The burden of Moab. Because in the night Ar of Moab is laid waste, and brought to silence; because in the night Kir of Moab is laid waste, and brought to silence; ▼
▼ brought…: or, cut off

footnotes.body_html: ▼ brought…: or, cut off

verses.text_plain: He is gone up to Bajith, and to Dibon, the high places, to weep: Moab shall howl over Nebo, and over Medeba: on all their heads shall be baldness, and every beard cut off.
verses.verse_html: 2He is gone up to Bajith, and to Dibon, the high places, to weep: Moab shall howl over Nebo, and over Medeba: on all their heads shall be baldness, and every beard cut off.

verses.text_plain: In their streets they shall gird themselves with sackcloth: on the tops of their houses, and in their streets, every one shall howl, weeping abundantly.
verses.verse_html:
3In their streets they shall gird themselves with sackcloth: on the tops of their houses, and in their streets, every one shall howl, weeping abundantly. ▼
▼ weeping…: Heb. descending into weeping, or, coming down with weeping

tokens.text: of their houses, and in their streets

footnotes.body_text: ▼ weeping…: Heb. descending into weeping, or, coming down with weeping
footnotes.body_html: ▼ weeping…: Heb. descending into weeping, or, coming down with weeping

verses.text_plain: And Heshbon shall cry, and Elealeh: their voice shall be heard even unto Jahaz: therefore the armed soldiers of Moab shall cry out; his life shall be grievous unto him.
verses.verse_html: 4And Heshbon shall cry, and Elealeh: their voice shall be heard even unto Jahaz: therefore the armed soldiers of Moab shall cry out; his life shall be grievous unto him.

verses.text_plain: My heart shall cry out for Moab; his fugitives shall flee unto Zoar, an heifer of three years old: for by the mounting up of Luhith with weeping shall they go it up; for in the way of Horonaim they shall raise up a cry of destruction.
verses.verse_html:
5My heart shall cry out for Moab; his fugitives shall flee unto Zoar, an heifer of three years old: for by the mounting up of Luhith with weeping shall they go it up; for in the way of Horonaim they shall raise up a cry of destruction. ▼
▼ his…: or, to the borders thereof, even to Zoar, as an heifer
 , ▼
▼ destruction: Heb. breaking

footnotes.body_text: ▼ his…: or, to the borders thereof, even to Zoar, as an heifer
footnotes.body_html: ▼ his…: or, to the borders thereof, even to Zoar, as an heifer

verses.text_plain: For the waters of Nimrim shall be desolate: for the hay is withered away, the grass faileth, there is no green thing.
verses.verse_html:
6For the waters of Nimrim shall be desolate: for the hay is withered away, the grass faileth, there is no green thing. ▼
▼ desolate: Heb. desolations

verses.text_plain: Therefore the abundance they have gotten, and that which they have laid up, shall they carry away to the brook of the willows.
verses.verse_html:
7Therefore the abundance they have gotten, and that which they have laid up, shall they carry away to the brook of the willows. ▼
▼ brook…: or, valley of the Arabians

tokens.text: and that which they have laid up

footnotes.body_text: ▼ brook…: or, valley of the Arabians
footnotes.body_html: ▼ brook…: or, valley of the Arabians

verses.text_plain: For the cry is gone round about the borders of Moab; the howling thereof unto Eglaim, and the howling thereof unto Beer–elim.
verses.verse_html: 8For the cry is gone round about the borders of Moab; the howling thereof unto Eglaim, and the howling thereof unto Beer–elim.

verses.text_plain: For the waters of Dimon shall be full of blood: for I will bring more upon Dimon, lions upon him that escapeth of Moab, and upon the remnant of the land.
verses.verse_html:
9For the waters of Dimon shall be full of blood: for I will bring more upon Dimon, lions upon him that escapeth of Moab, and upon the remnant of the land. ▼
▼ more: Heb. additions
